title: 16-year-old charged in shooting of another teen
content:
FINDLAY — A 16-year-old boy is in jail today after he was accused of shooting and injuring a 17-year-old boy, authorities said.
The boys’ names and the victim’s condition were not released.
The alleged shooter was charged with felonious assault and booked into the Wood County Juvenile Detention Center pending his initial appearance in the Hancock County Juvenile Court, Findlay police said. The victim was admitted to Blanchard Valley Hospital.
A family member of the victim called police to report the shooting about 5:40 p.m. Sunday, police said. An ensuing investigation led police to the suspect, who was arrested about three hours later, according to a written statement police released today.
Police said they had retrieved a gun they said was used in the incident. The motive of the shooting was not released.
